sentence.Network_en: Last night's harrowing television pictures plumbed new depths of depravity.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨晚触目惊心的电视画面堕落到了新低。

sentence.Network_en: It is a mark of depravity to make a mock of good advice and kind rebuke.
sentence.Network_cn: 嘲笑别人的忠告和善意指责是堕落的标志.

“全然败坏”（Total depravity）不意味着“完全败坏”（utter depravity）。完全败坏的意思是某人坏到他/她可以坏的最大程度。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: alteration (influenced by deprave) of obsolete pravity, from Latin pravitas, from pravus 'crooked, perverse'

entry.tran: 堕落;腐化;道德败坏;邪恶
entry.def: Depravity is very dishonest or immoral behaviour.
